title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.7 - Changing lanes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.7 - Changing lanes

State Regulations
A vehicle shall be driven as nearly as practicable entirely
within a single lane and shall not be moved from such lane until the driver has
first ascertained that such movement can be made with safety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
103.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
